Title: Dell Laptops w/Extended Warranty
Term of Bid: Valid for at least 90 days after the due date
Payment Terms: Invoice(s) shall be submitted within 10 days of delivering the equipment.
Any Additional Documentation Required: Proof of delivery including packing slip or delivery confirmation
Warranty certificate or Affidavit to be presented upon award
Contract or Cooperative to use: Desktop, Laptop and Tablet 2015 Master Contract, 060B5400007
contact_info: Tamaira Hawkins, thawkins@treasurer.state.md.us, 410-260-7533, MD State Treasurer's Office, 80 Calvert Street, Room 109, Annapolis, MD 21401
Bid Summary: Office is in need of a refresh of laptops and must acquire enough laptops to accommodate MD529 employees who have been included in our staff as of June 1, 2023.

specs.display: 15.6", FHD 1920x1080, 60Hz, IPS, Non-Touch, AG, 250 nit, 45% NTSC
